title: Legal Status of the Cassady & Greene back catalog
content: Does anyone know what the actual legal status of the old Cassady and Greene font library. The company went bust in 2003 and their fonts appear widely on even some of the most reputable free font archives. Being on a budget and wanting a Bodoni to play with, i did a search for "free didone fonts" or something and found a bunch of links to Bodoni FLF. Before I download it, I want to know if these are legal.
author: mjkerpan
